# SAPHanaHighAvailability
An alert is triggered if the HANA high-availability cluster with replication is not fully up and running. The metrics frequency is 5 seconds(default). The query window is 1m to tolerate one-off measurements. The following metrics are used in this alert:
```
workload.googleapis.com/sap/mntmode
       0 -- no maintenance; alert if system not available
     1 -- maintenance; no alert
workload.googleapis.com/sap/hana/ha/availability
    4 -- system available (primary online & replication running)
    max() < 4 -- there is some issue with primary or replication
```
